properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Stake Island LA to Southwest Pass of the Mississippi River from 20 to 60 nm; Coastal Waters from Boothville LA to Southwest Pass of the Mississippi River out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Pascagoula Mississippi to Stake Island Louisiana out 20 to 60 NM; Coastal waters from Pascagoula Mississippi to Stake Island out 20 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 18 at 3:25PM CST until January 20 at 12:00PM CST by NWS New Orleans LA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the first Small Craft Advisory, seas 5 to 8 ft. For
the second Small Craft Advisory, north winds 20 to 25 kt with
gusts up to 35 kt and seas 6 to 9 ft expected.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters from Boothville LA to Southwest Pass of
the Mississippi River out 20 nm, Coastal waters from
Pascagoula Mississippi to Stake Island out 20 NM, Coastal
Waters from Stake Island LA to Southwest Pass of the
Mississippi River from 20 to 60 nm and Coastal waters from
Pascagoula Mississippi to Stake Island Louisiana out 20 to 60
NM.

* WHEN...For the first Small Craft Advisory, until 6 PM CST this
evening. For the second Small Craft Advisory, from 3 AM Sunday
to noon CST Monday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Conditions will improve for a period this
evening prior to the arrival of a strong cold front tonight.
This frontal passage will cause conditions to become hazardous
once again into Sunday and early Monday.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM SUNDAY TO NOON CST MONDAY
